meta.name: description
meta.content: An archive of clues and players for Jeopardy! show #4383.

td.p: Elisabeth Corkran, a human resources coordinator from Atlanta, Georgia
Brad Telford, a waiter from Houston, Texas
Chuck Champagne, a vice president of finance from Cumberland, Rhode Island (whose 3-day cash winnings total $49,002)

tr.td: IT'S NOT BRAIN SURGERY
ONE-CONGRESSMAN STATES
POP MUSIC PAIRINGS
ENGLISH COUNTY NAMES
THE GOOD BOOK
THIRTY SOMETHING

women and children first')
